name: Dynamite Blaster
description:
As a gray little tic-tac, your task is to prepare sticks of dynamite. Armed with a boatload of priming bullets, shoot the particles to cause them to split and fill the area. Once the timer finishes the countdown, the fuses will trigger an explosive chain reaction!

Careful while splitting particles, if they are too primed they could implode and wipe out a portion of your hard work!

Enjoy the chaos of my first Game Jam game.
Brackeys 2021.2 - Let there be chaos

~Controls~

Move:   WASD / Arrow Keys
Shoot:   Left mouse click / ctrl
Zoom:   Mouse scroll
